PAD_DeadOgre.synopsis: Player has just discovered that a mysterious figure who freed them from chains also took out a huge ogre bodyguard.

VB_Chains.synopsis: on seeing or escaping from the chains in the goblin priestess' chapel

VB_Branding.synopsis: Player comments on the smell of burnt flesh as they enter a temple where a goblin priestess is branding other goblins

PAD_DeadOgre_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DeadOgre_0.text: Killed without a mark. Who the hells does she serve?

VB_Chains_0.speaker: Player
VB_Chains_0.text: I wonder who - or what - those chains are for.
VB_Chains_0.context: NodeContext: unnerved, just saw prison chains in a goblin chapel

VB_Chains_1.speaker: Player
VB_Chains_1.context: NodeContext: just escaped from chains, but still in danger

VB_Branding_0.speaker: Player
VB_Branding_0.text: Smells like burnt flesh in here.
